### Tender Notice

#### Request for Proposal
PR113189 - 1000444159

[Original Attachment: English and French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23553/pr113189---1000444159-rfp_2.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23553/pr113189---1000444159-ddp_0.pdf)

### Tender Description

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites eligible Proposers to submit a Bid for the provision of Professional Photographer Services under Request for Proposal (RFP) PR113189 - 1000444159. The proposed period of contract shall be from the date of contract award to March 31, 2025, with an irrevocable option to extend the term of the Contract by up to four (4) additional one (1) year periods.

### Contract Details

* Contract Title: Services of a Professional Photographer
* Location: Rigaud, QC
* Work Description: Provide high-quality photos for various College activities within a prescribed time as described in the Ceremonies sections.
* Security Requirements: This notice contains security requirements.
* Trade Agreements: This requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and all international free trade agreements including the World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).

### Points of Contact

* Contracting Authority: Nathalie Gervais
* E-mail: [nathalie.gervais@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.gervais@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 571-8570

### Bidding Instructions

* All relevant material/documentation will be posted on CanadaBuys at the same time as this Notice of Proposed Procurement.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process.

### Tendering Requirements

* The work under this contract is to provide the equipment, materials, and professional labor required to produce high-quality photos for various College activities, within a prescribed time as described in the Ceremonies sections.
* The tender must include a detailed proposal that meets the requirements outlined in the tender notice.
* Proposers must provide a clear and concise description of the services, including any supporting documentation.

###
